welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fort Atkinson, a charming city known for its rich history and scenic beauty. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rock County Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Rock County Airport caters to private jets and offers exclusive services for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dane County Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a smaller terminal at Dane County Regional Airport, serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
